tool_description: Understanding the emotional content of text can provide valuable insights about users or the content, especially in areas such as customer feedback, reviews, customer support, and product branding.
name: Emotion Classification
title: Emotion Classification

api_list.name: emotion
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://emotion-classification.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/emotion"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "emotion-classification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
